description: Tree work subject of TPO. Pruning of 3 Horsechestnut - rear. Work: 73  Sunnyside Rd (T14) Horsechestnut reduce upper branches to up 3 or 4. Shorten branch over garden by a third and the branch over garden fence also by a third. Reduce branch towards Hazellville Rd by half. Lift crown by up to 20'. Thin and reshape. 77 Sunnyside (T13) Horsechestnut. Reduce by half trunk over 96 Hazellville Rd. Take down middle leader to the top fork. Cut back trunk over shed to about the top old pollard. Thin and balance crown. 98 Hazellville Rd. (T12) Horsechestnut Reduce height by a quarter towards garden of 77 Sunnyside Rd. Crown lift by up to 18' - 20' deadwood and balance crown.
decision_conditions: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
